Key Match Events: Jeremy Pe√±a hit a three-run homer to right-center field in the sixth inning
Chas McCormick went 2-for-4 with a clutch two-run single with the bases loaded in the fourth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Astros manager Joe Espada emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Espada expressed pride in the team's offense, stating 'I thought overall our approach was really, really good today offensively. We hit a ton of balls [up the] middle and the other way.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros improved to 7-0 in games started by Yusei Kikuchi
The team sent 10 batters to the plate in the fourth inning and had two hits and drew four walks
Others: The Astros' offense is getting close to being at full strength with the return of outfielder Kyle Tucker and the potential return of third baseman Alex Bregman
